name: Devil's Deep Dish
description:
The deepest pizza adventure of 2021!

🍕 Controls:
- A,D or Left & Right Arrow Keys = Player Movement

- Spacebar = Jump, Double-jump

- Left Mouse Button or Control = Dash

- Story Progression = Right Arrow

- Restart from Game End = R

- Enter Game from Story = Enter

😈 By: Bulky Vulture (the artists formerly known as Zamboni Macaroni)  

Visit us online: https://www.zambo.fun        

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BulkyVulture
